channel.title: sources on Stitch-n-Glue
channel.description: Recent content in sources on Stitch-n-Glue

item.title: 2. Sourcing Materials
item.description: It’s time to start the project by ordering plans and materials! I narrowed down my choices but still agonized over the final decisions.

item.title: 1. The Dream
item.description: I’ve been dreaming of owning a fast, light kayak for years…decades really. I got the bug shortly after moving to Sarasota on Florida’s Gulf coast in 2000.
